name: TimeRift Pre-Alpha .01
description:
Time and Space are coming undone by a Gigantic SpaceCrag! Time is the last hope of stopping it from consuming existence! Collect the mysterious CrystaLeafs and TimeFragments to repair the damaged universe!

This is vey early in the development. This is more or less a proof of concept. I want to get some feedback and suggestions about what I have so far! Hope you enjoy jumping around and collecting! :D  

If you want to learn more about TimeRift and my game dev journey, check out facebook and Instagram!
